values:
So, things are going really good at work. I am 'substitute'  manager (055 it's called) five nights a week while my manager is on maternity leave. I get fridays and saturdays off now! That's kind of cool. Don't know what I'll be doing when she gets back. Hopefully I'll be able to move up to the nesxt stage. I am really looking forward to start an actual career in the resteraunt business.

Jenna is 8 months old in six days! I can't believe how fast time is flying. I couldn't ask for a better baby. She is always happy and playful, we hardly ever have a problem with her unless she is teething that day. She's sitting up on her own and SO close to crawling. Time to baby proof our house!

My new roommate is awesome. We're getting along great. We have done a lot of work on our house and it's looking fantastic. I think that this will be a long term thing and I"m looking forward to it.

My car is STILL in the shop. I really regret buying it now. But I'm going to have a practically new car when I get it back because of all the work I've had done on it. But this shop is horrible and if it's not right this time I want to sue. It's been over two months and they still don't have my car done!

The whole Jared thing is starting to calm down. His stuff is gone and I haven't heard from him. I am so relieved to have him out of my life. Now I just need to get the ball rolling on the whole child support and sole legal custody. And I need to figure out how to change Jenna's last name. 

So, that's the update on my life for now. Sorry to keep most of you in the dark for so long!
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/127647.html

So, Jared is gone. Long gone. Goodbye. It's a shame that I will have to see you again, since we share a daughter. You have made me miserable long enough, I won't let you make our daughter miserable too.

So now I'm in this $985/month house, with a car payment, three credit cards, comcast, verizon, electricity, water, insurance..omg, it seems like the bills just keeping going on and on. I make really good money, but it's going to be a tight squeeze, and just one day off will hurt. I just did my finances and I have a little more than I thought I did, so woohoo!

oh! and I'm getting a roommate! her name is kayley. she's awesome. and pregnant. I think we are going to do well. I'm going to DSHS with her tomorrow and we're both going to get foodstamps. And hopefully I can get some money for childsupport since Jared isn't working. I can also get money for childcare! 

Oh, and my mom told me that my grandparents might be sending me some money, since they just sent Skyler and Shasta some money. Plus the rebate from Bush. And I should be getting my deposit back from the duplex soon too! Financially, I think I'll be just fine.

Still stressed about my car though. I guess there is a blown head gasket, and the insurance company wants to total it out. My only hope is that my powertrain warranty will cover it. Crossing my heart. I blame Jared for driving my car the way he did.

I am free and excited to move on with my life.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/127401.html

I have not updated in a long time...Things have been rather hectic in my life. We have moved to Puyallup. We are renting a cute little three bedroom house. I'm still working in Auburn and the commute isn't as bad as I thought. It's nice to be in an actual house. 

Work is going great! I am training for management. I really hope to get an assistant manager position within the next two years..and then manage my own denny's within the next five years. 

Jenna is getting so big! She'll be six months old next week! She's starting to get her first teeth, so she drools everywhere. She's such a happy baby though. Always smiling and playing. She hardly ever fusses.

Not really sure what else to say...Hopefully I'll be on the council for bethel 30 next term. Don't know when I will find out...Kind of nerovus about it. 

Um..that's pretty much all I have...
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/127129.html

I put up some pictures of Jenna on myspace! go check them out!!


myspace.com/juniperfae
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/126926.html

So, my beautiful baby was born Oct. 11th and 5:44 AM. It ended up being a C-section. When I arrived Tuesday morning, I took Cytotec orally, and that afternoon they had me take it again vaginally, they also gave me a folley ball which was extremely painful. That night they started the Pitocen but nothing was happening so they stopped it and gave me a shot of morphine to help me sleep.  Wednesday morning they started up the pitocen again, and that afternoon they broke my water. After they broke my water things got really painful so they started the epidural. Wednesday night my epidural stopped working, so they tried just giving me a big dose again, but it still didn't work. They ended up taking it out and giving me a new one. After that happened I started throwing up and shaking uncontrollably, for the next two hours my temperature kept rising, and my cervix had my dialated to a six for like ten hours now, and the baby just wouldn't drop. So they decided to do the c-section. It was so incredibly painful, they knocked me out as soon as her umbilical cord was cut. 

We were in the hospital until monday! that's 6 days! The recovery is so so so painful, tiring and hard. Not to mention that my emotions are so out of control. I take so many pills now I feel like an AIDS patient. 

It is all worth it though. My daughter is SO beautiful. I will hopefully have pictures soon.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/126705.html

So, tomorrow we go in to Tacoma General to induce labor...I'm so nervous, I don't know what to do with myself...My baby is on her way. The induction could take up to three days in some cases, and I'm hoping that won't happen for us. It would be great if I could just give birth tomorrow...OMG! I'm going to have a baby! It seems so surreal...I can't imagine what it's going to be like. 

Anyone wishing to stop by is more than welcome to. Can't guarantee I'll be in the best of moods, but who knows, I've been surprisingly upbeat during my whole pregnancy. Not the emotional wreck of a woman you see on tv all the time. 

I'm excited to have my mobility back...to be able to bend down and roll over without so much effort. not to have my belly bumping into things all the time...but still...a BABY!
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/126265.html

I had a dream last night that I decided to stop by and say hi to Mrs. Lowery, and Kim was there! I was surprised, cause she didn't let me know that she was going to be in town for a visit. So Kim was showing me all the remodeling that her parents had done to the house (I know they really have done some in real life) and Katie and Sally came knocking on the door! It was really cool to have them all in one place to hang out, I was still preggo so they got to see my belly and stuff...and then Kirbey showed up! At first I tried to hide from her but then we talked and made up and everything...That's when I woke up cause I had to pee...but it was a weird dream...
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/125955.html

So. I HATE being pregnant right now. I want this stupid baby out of me. She kicks so hard it hurts, I'm tired, I can't get comfortable, my back hurts, I have to pee all the time, my head is killing me, and I hate taking insulin.  The baby room is all set up and I feel pretty prepared for her to come, so now it's just this waiting game...

So the trip to the hospital and the two days of worrying was for nothing because Jenna decided to roll over on her own, so she's head down again. Hopefully she stays that way.

In other news, I went to the jobie meeting the other night, and it was absolutely heartbreaking. There were two girls. They only did a round table, because there wasn't a daughter to lead the meeting. This is Leanndra's last year as guardian, we will have a new one in May...I hope the bethel can hold out that long, and that it's not too late to be saved.  Heather resigned and no longer attends, and I don't blame her. Cause everytime something went wrong the finger was pointed at her...NO it's not her fault that the guardian never sends in paperwork on time, it's not her fault that she is met with 'no' everytime she attempted to do anything.

I want bethel 30 to survive, and I feel horrible for not being able to help out more. Even now, I can't volunteer to do anything right now, because I never know when I'll be going into labor...but I really am planning on doing as much as I can when Jenna gets here. 

Jared is working at TGIFridays, and seems to like it. He has been helping out by washing dishes this week, but he starts his real job on tuesday I think. He'll be a line cook again, which is fantastic, cause he really loved cooking at VI. I hate just sittting around the house all day long..he does everything. cooks, cleans, works. 

I'm going to go lay down...my head hurts soooo bad all the letters I'm typing are all fuzzy...
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/125904.html

So. Jenna (my baby) has been in position for about a month and a half down, head down and ready to come out...but for some reason, during this past week, she's decided that's uncomfortable and has turned over, so she's now breached. GR! So, on saturday I go in to the hospital for an aversion, which means they are going to push on my belly a whole bunch to try to get her back into the right position. It's really nerve racking cause there are quite a few complications that could happen...pre-term labor, umbilical cord could tangle, placenta could break away...But if I don't try it's an automatic scheduled c-section...so it's worth a try, I suppose....cross your fingers and hope that all goes well!
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/125488.html

So. Life is crazy hectic and emotional. But what else can you expect?  I am officially nine months pregnant today, according to the doctors.  So Jenna will be here soon. It's nerve racking, cause I don't feel ready. We still don't have a mattress for the crib!!! 

I stopped working finally, and it is such a relief. I was so exhausted, it was just getting too hard. Jared is job hunting like crazy and we're crossing our fingers that he'll find something soon. We're going to try to move to Puyallup, cause Auburn just isn't working out.  Our duplex, as much as I loved it, is simply too much hassle. We've had ants the entire time we've lived here, and now we think there might be termites in the floor. The fridge leaks, the dishwasher door is broken, one of the stove top burners doesn't work, and there is NO insulation in the walls! NONE! We will freeze our butts off in the winter! 

We packed our bags for the hospital and are hoping she'll stay in until we find a place to live. Although I can't wait to get her out of me. I feel like I'm on my period right now, and my back hurts SO bad. I'm always tired, but my sleep is so restless...

Anyways, I think we're going to head down to Puyallup to do some hunting now. 

Peace ya'll
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/125426.html

a family friend killed herself. Suicide lives in Washington....

There is a Jobie bethel opening in Palisade..about five minutes from here. I'm happy about that...
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/125018.html

I have a really bad bladder and urinary tract infection...like, I'm peeing blood. I'm on antibiotics and painkillers, but it still hurts SO bad. I know how Sally felt at Grand Session that one year..."gotta go, gotta go, gotta go right now!"

Jamie moved in with her two sons, for a while, till she can save up to get into her own place. It's been really nice to have kids in the house, they're adorable. It gives me uterus pangs.

I started taking Paxil. I think it might be working. I went to Rite Aide, the bank and Big O tires all by myself today. I've been trying not to sleep so much...but I did take a three hour nap today, but last night I was up tossing and turning cause of this infection.. I'm still having episodes though...these spouts of time when I can't breathe, I want to pull my hair out, scream and cry. I wish I could make the voices in my head stop...

Anywho, I'm going to go play with the boys now.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/124747.html

For those of you wanting to know...Jared crashed my car in Idaho. we hit black ice and slush. It was an unfortunate event...ended up having to take a 14 hour bus ride to get back home in time for work....
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/124639.html

I keep meaning to update...but I can't ever think of what to say...

Work and sleep...that's all we do.

My car is totalled...goodbye Lucy. I'll miss her.

um...yup...that's pretty much all for now.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/124269.html

I haven't updated in forever, I know. Life has been...interesting...

Colorado is fine. it's fun. it's not home, but I am enjoying it. It's nice to be out on my own, away from all the negativity that was dragging me down in Washington. I do miss home a lot...I wish with all my heart that I could come home to visit soon...but there's no way that is possible.

School is...ok. Kind of feels like high school classes, they're just so blah. Except my Comparative Politics class which is actually full of intelligent people. 

I love my job. I love the people I work with...I wish the money wasn't so unpredictable, but I'm getting by...

I'm in Jared's room now...well, our room I guess? I've sort of moved in with him? Nikki and I are officially moving in next month, but all of my stuff is here already. It's crazy.  Part of me is screaming 'TOO SOON!!!' but another part of me is at peace, calm and happy with the decision. 

My health is good. I've been getting headaches this last week, but I just think that's from the stress. My sugars have been decent. I have this weird bump on my hand that I need to get removed in January or February...cause it's painful...

well, I'm going to curl up on the bed with Jared for a little bit before I have to go to work.

I hope everyone is doing well.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/124030.html

My sleep has been restless
with your warm body
pressed up against me
electricity flowing through my veings
keeps my body up, my mind racing

your lips grazing my skin
leaving your mark with teeth
hands are exploring my body
and I tremble at the touch
my mouth is screaming for the taste of you

These late night pleasures
leave me exhausted and breathless
with our bodies spent
we collapse into arms
a night in warm embrace

My sleep has been restless
in an empty bed
twisted in sheets, instead of arms
the night seems so cold
without you keeping me warm

the silence is deafening
the sound of my own breath
echoingin the vacant room
and my sleep has been restless
since I met you.

-L
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/123714.html

Words that are not mine o say
are dripping from my lips
and they are burning you like acid
this is my betrayal

With each syllable I hate myself
a little more, for each knife in your back
and if I could drink away your pain
I would dehydrate you

I have your forgiveness
but the trust is lost forever
and I weep for the conversations lost
the connection I blame myself for destroying

The shame of my actions
is breeding fear in my heart
and I bit my tongue
till I drown in blood

afraid to speak again,
I want to beg you to stay
to lay with me like before
but my company is no longer desired.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/123577.html

Time is running out
my veings are bleeding dry
and this body won't last much longer

The clock is ticking
and you're wasting days
with sex, drugs and rock'n'roll

we're living mediocre lives
and this is not the legacy
I want to leave behind

Time is running out
my life is slipping from my fingers
with each prick of the needle

your touch is fading fast
the memory of your kisses
will not last long

Unspoken words
playing it safe
because my time is running out
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/123227.html
NIKKI AND I GOT TWO NEW KITTENS!!!!! THIS IS FIZZLE! SHE'S MY BABY!!!! THIS IS ME AND FIZZLE!!! FIZZLE, ME AND CHARLIE!!!!

My heart drops into my stomach
when I hear my phone ring
Beethoven's fifth symphony
sends goose bumps up my spine

my fingers tremble with fear
and the sound of your voice
makes my blood run cold
and eyes burn with tears

your words degrade me
to a point of self hatred
and I'm gagging on my screams
like I did with your cock in my mouth

I can still feel your hands
landing blows upon my back
fingers yanking at my hair
prying my legs apart

I put 1,000 miles between us
but you still rape my dreams
and these bruises will never fade
my cunt is damaged beyond repair

And with each phone call
I hear you growing weaker
I miss you's and I love you's
won't mend this broken soul


- feel free to leave comments, but I'm not answering any questions about this one. -
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/122589.html

Colorado seems to have sparked my creativity or something, because I've already written something else..


You make me hate myself
With words of digust
My mind is filled with trash
and a loathing that diminishes my self worth
 
My veins are so full of poison
my very soul tries to break free  
of the suffocating prison 
your words have created for me
 
My body yearns for a refreshing touch 
of a cool, clean blade to write a treaty  
in blood and flesh 
requiring the sacrafice of life
 
and your hatred drips down my fingers 
from wounds I blame you for 
black as blood and I weep 
for the love I never felt
 
I weep for the loss of feelings 
as my body drains clean 
I become an empty shell
so numb your words no longer stick
 
So numb, so cold 
you speak love at my funeral 
because you know it's your fault
You made me hate myself.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/122166.html

I have not written anything in ages...this is not about anything, it's not about anyone. Please do not assume that it's you, or that you know what it's referring to. I just wrote it. 

One night to share with you 
and we spend it with passion
carressing silk sheets
our bodies uniting
skin slik with sweat
and your hands know me so well

My mind is racing
with thoughts of tomorrow
your mind thinks only of release
for your physical pleasures
hearts pounding like drums
my very breath is stolen

I leave like a whore
dark of night with a "thanks" from you
dirty and used, I am betrayed
I walk the empty streets
a lone soul seeking forgiveness
for sins my body has committed

My heart is a broken box
and the pieces of us hidden inside
are spiling out through the tears
that stain my blushing cheeks
a smile still lingering on my lips
at the thought of having you

Just one night to share
the comfort of your presence
shattered by a drunken lust
replaced by a burning flrame
a desire for more of you and I think...
Next time...but there will be no next time.

 

Enjoy...let me know what you think.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/122069.html

http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/121538.html

So, I know I haven't updated, like a real update, in a really long time...sorry.

What have I been up to? Not much..

THIS TIME NEXT WEEK I'LL BE AT WESTPORT! It can't come at a more perfect time, I'm super psyched. I look forward to Westport all year long.

I really like working at Denny's. I'm training to be a server right now, which means more money! woohoo! Even though I'm going to have to quit in about a month, I want them to train me so I can say I have waitressing experience. lol.

Jobie Installation is tomorrow. I'm Mistress of Ceremonies, so I have to look all pretty. It's hard to think that this might be my last installation for a really long time...who knows when I'll be back to see another one...

My dad is in china again. for three weeks this time. he'll be gone for my birthday..and when I pointed it out, he said, "so?"...so...it's my birthday...whatever. I'm so over getting hurt by the things he says to me.

I mowed the lawn today. go me ^_^. 

testing my blood sugar hurt a lot at first, but doesn't so much anymore...and I have a much better understanding of my diabetes now...I have to make an appointment with the pediatrist soon, to get my feet checked before i moved...I also need to go get my eyes checked too. Then I just have two check ups..1 with my regular physician and 1 with my diabetes educator and I'll be done and ready to move.

Not sure what else to say...so i'm probably going to head home now.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/121284.html

Christian, marked for life for being under 21... The Army hasn't changed her much.. There's a Martini glass on her hand.. Kate Kate Jen Kate Jen Kate Shane w/ her golden vocals Joe Shane Shane Kate Kate Shane Shane Joe So...I was standing on Kate's side, that's why there's so many of her. A lot of them didn't turn out, sadly..and no matter how hard I tried I could not get one of KII (drummer) cause it was too dark.

So..I've been reading and watching a lot about the Capitol Hill massacre this past weekend...it seems so odd. I don't know why...but it's just all very intriguing to me...

And have you seen the picture of the guy? He looks so familiar...like one of those faces that you see every day and never really think anything of...just the typical guy...

I don't really know what else to say about the event...it's just...weird...
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/120319.html

So, orientation was really long...three and a half hours! But I think I'm going to like working there, everyone seems really nice. I don't know when my first day is yet, I have to call in on Monday to find out.

I canceled the date this morning...I just wasn't looking forward to it. In fact, I was kind of dreading it...And I figure, if I'm already feeling like this before going on the date, then I shouldn't waste my time...When I go on a date, I want to be excited, and look forward to it...ya know?

Besides, Jen told me the guy is really dense...I know, what guy isn't dense? but yea, not worth my time...

So anyways...Mom comes home tomorrow, I'm excited about that...

I'm hungry, but I don't know what I want to eat.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/119927.html

I GOT THE JOB AT DENNYS! GO ME!!!!!!!! WOOT WOOT. My orientation is tomorrow. ^_^


And I have a date on friday night...I think...dinner and a movie with this guy I met last weekend...I'm scared to death, I've never been on a date, and I don't know what to wear/how to do my hair....>.>

I WAS CALLED IN FOR A SECOND INTERVIEW AT DENNY'S! GO ME!!!

I leave for it in like...15 minutes, so send me all the good prosperous vibes please!!!!
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/119354.html

One of the masons in my Amaranth Chapter has been diagnosed with ALS (Lou Gehrig's Disease). There is no cure, and no treatment, though he is involved involved in a research study. His daughter is a triathlon competitor, and this year, for the IronMan Triathlon, she is raising money for ALS in her father's name.

Lew Vogel has been active in the masonic lodge for as long as I can remember, and has always been willing to lend a helping hand whenever needed. Now he is fighting a disease, and he needs the helping hand.

Please visit

www.januscharitychallenge.com/az06/reina

for more information on how to support Reina in her efforts to raise money for ALS Research. 

I'd like to encourage all of you to spread the word.

Thank you.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/119235.html

I just set up my MaryKay website! so go look at all the cool stuff they have! 

www.marykay.com/lrnorris

I'm having my first MaryKay party on Thursday! All are welcome to come, just let me know and I will send you directions! Please come! or ask me about setting up your own party! Even if you don't actually want to buy anything, just throw a have a MaryKay party with a couple of your friends, so I can get my name out and get started, I need the practice anyways! 

I also had a job interview yesterday and Denny's. I think it went really really well. The guy that interviewed me was smiling and laughing the whole time, and I think he really liked me! I really hope I get this job!
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/118919.html

Ok. So. When I first think of MaryKay, I always just think it's an old lady product.

Sundi (an adult from jobies) took me to this MaryKay class with her this morning. I got to try out a bunch of their products...face wash, moisturizer, exfoliator, foundation, eyeshadow, etc...and wow, I love it! I don't like wearing foundation, but I love this stuff, I can't even tell I have anything on!

So I figure...why not give selling it a shot, cause I definetely want to keep using it...

So yes, I am selling MaryKay now...so, ORDER FROM ME! We have products for men too! And I can throw MaryKay parties for you too! So if you want to throw one, let me know! 

I"m going to keep looking for another job as well, just to be safe, in case I totally suck at this, lol.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/118657.html

I am very cold right now..

Going to see the play at PHS tonight...shakespeare, but I don't know which one...

WE WON! Rather, the girls won. FIRST PLACE  for their dance! They also got to perform infront of everyone at jobie weekend! it was all super exciting! GO BETHEL #30!!!!! WOOTWOOT!!!

We also got a new member out of the weekend, her name is Breane. yay!

So, I did some research on Colorado...the closest bethel to where I will be living is over 100miles away! :( but I emailed the lodge in town, and the WM said they just started a DeMolay chapter, and he's going to discuss Jobies with his lodge brothers at the next meeting. ^_^

Job hunting sucks. no luck yet. One of the adults at Jobies wants me to sell MaryKay products. >.> I don't know if I'd be any good at that...would anyone here buy from me?
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/118443.html

So, for the past two weeks, we've been so busy moving, and we didn't have a fridge until last night...so we've been eating out practically every night...so I was really really convinced that I gained like 10 pounds...but I just weighed myself. and HOORAY! I maintained my weight. thank goodness. 

So after this weekend I'm going to returning to my healthy eating habits...I say after this weekend, cause it's Jobie weekend, and I know I'm going to be eating bad things...cause HECK YES! I'M AN ADULT AND I CAN GO IN THE COOKING COMPETITION NOW! SCORE!!!! lmao.
http://faeriechan.livejournal.com/118118.html

So. We are all moved in to the new house now. hooray. I love it.

I got Lucy (my car) back today. She's gorgeous

Going to see Schoolyard Heroes tonight. Yay.

Jobie weekend this weekend. Super excited.

OMG SALLY IS PREGNANT!!!!!!! I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!!!! CONGRATULATIONS

I start my job hunt next week.

Probably going to go see Nikki in a couple weeks.

Still don't have a computer....bummer.

Gotta go. Love ya.

So recently, I made a small comment on a friend's journal about how it's bad to feed ducks. Unfortunately, I seem to have upset some people, which happens quite often. I think perhaps I did not articulate myself enough...so here is why you should not feed ducks.

Ducks beg for our attention and our food, which makes them hard to resist. It's great fun watching them gorge themselves on our leftovers, but the fact is, feeding ducks anything destroys their health and creates serious health risks to humans. Once they get a taste for junk food they stop eating the healthy natural foods in their environment.

The colorful Mallards and other wild ducks you see on many lakes and ponds have bodies that allow them to fly. They are physically designed to eat natural foods growing in their environment to stay healthy and light for flight. Sometimes a specially formulated duck food is provided to them, but only under strict supervision of park officials, when wild ducks are in a man-made setting or natural foods are not available. When wild ducks are fed human foods their organs become engorged and fatty on the inside and they quickly die from malnutrition, heart disease, liver problems and other health complications. An overfed, malnutritioned duck is sluggish and can't escape from predators. Feeding wild ducks adversely affects natural migration patterns, which are critical for their ongoing survival. 

From another source:

Ducks and geese normally eat seeds, roots, shoots of sedge, grass and aquatic plants such as millefoil and algae. Their digestive tracts aren't able to handle bread well. When the birds eat dry bread, it swells into an indigestible doughy mass in the stomach that can cause blockage and prevents the bird from absorbing nutrients. Sometimes the bread actually gets stuck in their throat making it impossible for them to swallow.

When ducks and geese (in fact, any bird) are given bread, large numbers of them repeatedly gather in the same place. The unnatural concentration of food and feces (poop) enables disease and illness to spread through large bird populations quickly. Also, bread that is left on the ground can pollute water and cause bacteria to grow possibly causing infections in these birds.

And another source:

Many health hazards can result from feeding migratory and domestic waterfowl such as ducks, geese and swans, and many municipalities have bans in place. The goal of this type of legislation is to prevent accumulation of droppings that may result in damage to flora, fauna and property, harm water quality, increase potential to spread disease or create a nuisance. Another goal is to protect the welfare of the birds themselves, as wildlife studies have shown that feeding waterfowl and migratory birds can interrupt their normal migration patterns, cause nutritional problems, and promote the spread of bird diseases. Regulations prohibit feeding waterfowl, as well as creating a condition which results in a congregation or congestion of waterfowl. Some legislation grants enforcement agencies the authority to disperse flocks by scare tactics or noise tactics.


So there. I'm not being selfish, fuck all of you for thinking that...as tasha said I'm "bad for the environment. You with you car and your lattes in the morning, and your stupid big ass house that's probably sitting where a rabbit's den was." It's bad for the DUCKS. You know, how you're supposed to cut holes in the plastic rings on coke, and crush cans so animals don't get stuck in it? You know how you should properly dispose of needles, rubber gloves, and popped balloons so that they don't hurt animals? It's the same fucking thing. Human food is harmful to ducks. We fill our bodies with all these preservatives and chemicals, why do we need to give all that to the animals too?
